briefTitle: Safety and Efficacy of the GTS400 Stent in Conjunction With Cataract
officialTitle: A Prospective, Randomized, Controlled, Parallel Groups, Multicenter Clinical Investigation Of The Trabecular Micro-Bypass Stent Model GTS400 In Conjunction With Cataract Surgery
summary: To evaluate the safety and efficacy of the Glaukos Trabecular Micro-Bypass Stent Model GTS400 in conjunction with cataract surgery, compared to cataract surgery only, in subjects with mild to moderate open angle glaucoma.

primaryOutcome.measure: Month 12 Intraocular Pressure â‰¤ 18 mmHg Without Topical Hypotensive Medications

commonTop: IOP increase >=10 mmHg versus baseline IOP at any visit
